channel.title: How to Uplaod a client that u have edited? [317] please help
channel.description:
Heeyyhh...Ive download a source+client named Gabba....its a awsome server But i have Editted it...like name changing and stuff...but how can i uplaod it...without that people can get into my files where they can change anything....
Just how can i uplaod the edited client..without people can change it...only me?
Greettzzz maikiew. ;D
i Did...The client files...without the run and compile
I added it to archive..clicked oke..uplaoded it to uppit..thats good?

item.title: How to Uplaod a client that u have edited? [317] please help
item.dc:creator: @maikiew maikiew
item.description:
@maikiew wrote:

the files in the client right?..still dont work…please add my msn

maik_wunderlich@msn.com

thnx…please help?its formationx

item.title: How to Uplaod a client that u have edited? [317] please help
item.dc:creator: @I96 I96
item.description:
@I96 wrote:

Well i dont even delete java files i just highlight all teh files right click>properties>hidden, makes it so people cant see em…works fine for me i dw bout deleting them

Read full topic
item.source: How to Uplaod a client that u have edited? [317] please help

item.title: How to Uplaod a client that u have edited? [317] please help
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

Delete all .java files then upload and ppl won’t be able to change the stuff…Technically they will if they decompile but that is the safest way…

Read full topic
